page.title: 10People and their jobs
page.content: We questioned people in the village about their jobs and then we took 14 of them and asked them in more detail about their jobs. The questions we asked were 1)Do you like your job? 2)Do you think the money you get is worth it? 3)Is your job interesting? 4)Do you get many people coming in? 5)Do you wear special clothes? 6)Does your job help other people? 7)Is your job indoors? 8)Do you make things? 9)Do you have to travel along way to work? 10)Do you go to different places every day to work? 11)Do you use tools for your job? 12)Do you have to work every day? 13)Do you get deleveries every week? 14)Is it noisy where you work?
